The video is not: disappearing from the Internet" as stated in the claim. It can easily be found online, embedded in a Guardian reprint of a 2015 report by the Associated Press.
The crash was investigated by the Nation: NTSB), which found that the plane stalled after takeoff due to improper restraint of special cargo (mine resistant ambush protected vehicles) on the airplane's main deck.
The video: although real and tragic, does not support the claim that the crash took place in Pakistan or that it is being covered up or scrubbed from the Internet.
